steps.description: GDC outdoor env block → GDMI pivot + housing length clarification
steps.query: Warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation. 2800 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation project, a gdc filter housing was requested. however, due to the outdoor installation environment, condensation can form on non-insulated metal surfaces. to prevent this, a double-wall insulated housing is required. therefore, we recommend the gdmi modulfilterskåp, which features a double-wall insulated housing. to proceed with the configuration, i need two details: what is the minimum expected ambient temperature at the installation site? what is the typical relative humidity at the site? additionally, the requested 2800 airflow_m3h exceeds the maximum capacity of 2000 for a single 600x600 mm module. 2 parallel units are required. alternatively, a single 600x900 mm module can handle 3000 m³/h. high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

assertions.name: detect_outdoor
assertions.actual: for the warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation project, a gdc filter housing was requested. however, due to the outdoor installation environment, condensation can form on non-insulated metal surfaces. to prevent this, a double-wall insulated housing is required. therefore, we recommend the gdmi modul

assertions.actual: for the warehouse rooftop exhaust ventilation project, a gdc filter housing was requested. however, due to the outdoor installation environment, condensation can form on non-insulated metal surfaces. to prevent this, a double-wall insulated housing is required. therefore, we recommend the gdmi modul

steps.description: Capacity exceeded + grease assembly + upsize suggestion
steps.query: Hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation. 1900 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC-FLEX in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation system, a two-stage filtration system is required. the gdc_flex filter is ideal for odor removal, but in kitchen environments, grease and oil exposure can quickly contaminate the activated carbon, rendering it ineffective. to prevent this, a pre-filter stage is necessary to remove grease and particulate matter before the air reaches the carbon filter. we will use a gdp planfilterskåp as the protector stage, followed by the gdc_flex as the target stage. both stages will use the 600x600mm duct dimensions and handle an airflow of 1900 m³/h. to finalize the configuration, i need the housing length for the gdc_flex unit: additionally, the requested 1900 airflow_m3h exceeds the maximum capacity of 1750 for a single 600x600 mm module. 2 parallel units are required. alternatively, a single 600x900 mm module can handle 2500 m³/h. high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

assertions.actual: for the hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation system, a two-stage filtration system is required. the gdc_flex filter is ideal for odor removal, but in kitchen environments, grease and oil exposure can quickly contaminate the activated carbon, rendering it ineffective. to prevent this, a pre-filter stage

steps.description: GDB hospital env block → GDMI pivot
steps.query: Hospital supply air ventilation. 3400 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDB in FZ.
steps.response_text: the gdb filter housing is not suitable for hospital environments due to its bolted construction, which does not meet the required leakage class and hygiene standards. the gdmi modulfilterskåp is approved for hospital use and offers a more appropriate solution. for the hospital supply air ventilation project, the required airflow is 3400 m³/h and the dimensions are 600x600mm. given the hygiene requirements for hospital environments, a stainless steel construction with c5 corrosion resistance is recommended per vdi 6022.

steps.description: Marine corrosion block (FZ=C3 vs C5 required) → material upgrade
steps.query: Cruise ship machinery room exhaust. 1800 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC in FZ.
steps.response_text: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces. therefore, i recommend a two-stage filtration system: the first stage will be a  gdp planfilterskåp  to capture salt spray upstream, protecting the second stage: a  gdmi modulfilterskåp , which is approved for marine environments. please provide the filter depth for the gdmi modulfilterskåp. also, to ensure proper protection against condensation, i need the minimum ambient temperature and typical relative humidity at the installation site: high humidity reduces carbon adsorption efficiency. keep relative humidity below 70% for optimal performance.

steps.description: Single complex query — validate all 10 reasoning layers
steps.query: Rooftop kitchen exhaust on hospital near sea. 3000 m³/h. 600x600. We want GDC-FLEX in RF.
steps.response_text: for the rooftop kitchen exhaust at the hospital near the sea, the gdc-flex filter is not suitable for this environment. the rail-mounted construction does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for a hospital environment. also, outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces, and salt spray accelerates corrosion.  i recommend the gdmi modulfilterskåp, which is approved for hospital environments. to protect the carbon filter from grease, which is common in kitchen environments and can deactivate the carbon, a two-stage filtration system is required. the first stage will be a gdp planfilterskåp for mechanical pre-filtration. i need two more details to finalize the configuration: first, what is the minimum expected ambient temperature at the installation site? second, what is the typical relative humidity at the site? additionally, the requested 3000 airflow_m3h exceeds the maximum capacity of 1750 for a single 600x600 mm module. 2 parallel units are required. alternatively, a single 600x1200 mm module can handle 3500 m³/h.
